'''Gonnhirrim''' [[Sindarin]] "Masters of Stone" was a name for the [[Dwarves]].<ref>{{S|Sindar}}</ref>
==Etymology==
The word consists of ''[[gond]]'' ("stone") + ''[[hîr]]'' ("lord, master") + the ending ''[[rim|-rim]]'' ("people").<ref>{{S|Appendix}}, entries ''gond'' & ''heru''</ref>
